During a Thursday conference call, Page said Eric Schmidt has done an outstanding job leading Google. We're all in great debt to Eric Schmidt and I think the results really speak for themselves. There's really no one else in the universe that could've accomplished what Eric Schmidt did. "I could not be more excited about moving us forward, and we're really only at the beginning," Page said.
